sentences.en: " The truth at last. Talking love and thinking money. How truly feminine!
sentences.cn: " 到底说真话了, 谈的是爱情,要的是金钱, 多么地地道道的女性 呀 !

sentences.en: Crook liked her well enough, but remained indifferent to her feminine charms.
sentences.cn: 克鲁格还比较喜欢她，只是对她的女性魅力却始终无动于衷。
黛安娜喜爱漂亮有女人味的东西。

sentences.en: I must admit I like looking feminine.
sentences.cn: 我得承认我喜欢看起来淑女一些。

sentences.en: I've always been attracted to very feminine, delicate women.
sentences.cn: 我总是被十分娇柔纤弱的女子吸引。

sentences.en: In both Welsh and Irish the word for "moon" is of feminine gender.
sentences.cn: 在威尔士语和爱尔兰语中，表示“月亮”的词是阴性的。

sentences.en: In many cases this " feminine " word is made by adding - ess.
sentences.cn: 在很多情况下,这种 ” 阴性 ” 词是利用加词尾-ess而构成的.

sentences.en: In most languages adjectives have slightly different spellings for masculine and feminine.
sentences.cn: 在多数语言中，形容词的阳性和阴性的拼法略为不同。

sentences.en: She has full of feminine delicacy.
She painted flowers and birds pictures akin to those of earlier feminine painters.
sentences.cn: 她画一些同早期女画家类似的花鸟画.

sentences.en: She presented an intriguing combination of feminine looks with a masculine mind.
sentences.cn: 人们在她身上看到了女子的容貌、男子的志气.

sentences.en: She was a very feminine person.
sentences.cn: 她是个很有女性气质的人.

sentences.en: She was utterly feminine and devastatingly attractive in an unstudied way.
sentences.cn: 她温存无比,魅力四射而又绝不矫揉造作.

sentences.en: That dress makes you look very feminine.
sentences.cn: 那件衣服你穿起来很有丽人风韵。

sentences.en: That's how she felt Light and warm and feminine.
sentences.cn: 这就是她的感觉,轻盈、温暖、女性化.

sentences.en: The girls were dainty and feminine.

words.tran_cn: 使……女性化；具有女性风度

trans.tran_cn: 女性的，女人味的，阴性的
